place.name: WIDMERPOOL
place.gazetteerText: WIDMERPOOL, a parish in Bingham district, Notts; 8½ miles SSE of Nottingham r. station. Post town, Nottingham. Acres, 2,190. Real property, £2,440. Pop., 151. Houses, 30. The manor belongs to J. Robinson, Esq. The living is a rectory in the diocese of Lincoln. Value, £232.* Patron, J. Robinson, Esq. The church is tolerable. (In 1870-72, John Marius Wilson's Imperial Gazetteer of England and Wales)
